comments:
It is not possible to set the port to connect to in the remote debug
configuration panel (Debug... panel).

To Reproduce:
1) Select Debug... from the debug menu
2) Select Remove Java Application from the Launch Configuration
3) Selct New
4) The attached stack trace is printed to the console
5) There is no way to set the config up.

I cannot reproduce on the latest code base (on windows...I will try on MAC as 
well momentarily).
which build are you using?
Still a problem on the MAC

On Windows, programatically calling org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Combo.setText
(String) fires a modifyText to the registered ModifyListeners.
On MacOSX, no callback occurs (good thing we got a Mac in MIN now ;-)  )

Andre, is this a known difference?

I have a fix in hand but no Mac at home to test on. If this is a stopper for 
you Bill I could provide a patch tomorrow?

Released fix in the debug code to handle the different behavior on Mac and 
Windows (and appearantly Linux). Changes to JavaConnectTab.

Logged bug 28035 for different behavior of the combo widget.

Please verify Luc
